reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Modifying. hire an Environmental Cooperation Prg A. TORP14 004 Equipment XRay Image Analysis TRN. LEASE FOR OBO 468 CARACOL 261 E KRAMP 36K/YEAR. Other Services - Contract Advisory and Assistance Service Management and Professional Support Services. Country Assistance Coord/Sr Democracy Advisor. 1% AQM Fees. INAMI Software Maintenance & Support - INL Mexico. FY16: INL WATER. AQM Fees 1%. PAE SAQMMA12C0117 Continuation OY3. IGV - Sales taxes for purchases or services to loc. 19318815Y0008-150001, EC-LEDS. MOD WATER (NWC). TELEPHONE LINE RENTAL

description.narrative: Combat transnational terrorism, especially from al-Qa'ida, its affiliates, and adherents using a strategic counterterrorism approach that focuses on 1) countering violent extremism; 2) building the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutions to address threats within their own borders; and 3) building stronger relationships with our partners around the world – in order to engage in a broader, more comprehensive counterterrorism effort that treats civilian institutions, to include the justice sector and law enforcement, as a critical part of building effective partner capacity to counter terrorism.

This award strives to combat transnational terrorism, counter violent extremism, build the capacity of civilian law enforcement and criminal justice institutuions, and build stronger relationships with our partners around the world. This includes Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.. NON-PROLIFERATION[Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.]. Non-Proliferation.
